title: The First Named
description: A powerful warlord and violet-eyed enchantress Amarino usurp King Ather and enslave people of Ark to an ancient power. In the distant forest hideaway of the court wizard, the three princes plot vengeance. An ancient tome prophesies only one prince can triumph. The 200-year old wizard, his young apprentice, and his telepathic cat quest for victory.
author: Jonathan Wylie
